title: Advanced Accounting Decision-Making Competency Enhancement via Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic accounting principles, financial statement analysis skills, and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to combine accounting thinking with critical judgment to solve real-world workplace problems

learning_goals: Learners can apply a reflective judgment model to analyze the context of accounting data and propose alternative interpretations.
Learners can derive a balance between accounting judgments and professional ethics through real-world case studies and incorporate it into decision-making.
Learners can structure their thinking processes and improve critical thinking through peer assessment and feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
